title: Sustainable Luxury Apartment with Panoramic Windows in Karlikowo, Sopot
description: Experience refined living in this stunning, energy-efficient apartment nestled in the signature seaside neighborhood of Karlikowo. Boasting bright, open living spaces enhanced by panoramic windows, the 72 sqm home features two tranquil bedrooms and a spacious modern bathroom. Residents benefit from both a shared sauna for year-round relaxation and an inviting rooftop deck perfect for sunset views. This home blends cutting-edge eco-conscious solutions with elevated comfort, ensuring an effortless and premium experience.
neighborhood_description: Karlikowo offers an ideal balance between a vibrant local atmosphere and peaceful pockets of green, with easy access to scenic biking routes and Sopot’s famous expansive beaches. Discover nearby eco-friendly cafés, charming boutiques, and healthy dining options. Convenient public transport and an extensive network of bike lanes invite you to embrace a balanced, active coastal lifestyle.
target_buyer: Ideal for luxury seekers and eco-conscious professionals or couples desiring a refined home in a vibrant, sustainable neighborhood with ample wellness and leisure options.
market_positioning: Positioned in the upper segment of Sopot's modern apartments, this residence caters to discerning buyers seeking luxury and sustainable design in a lively coastal setting with quick access to amenities.
